mutants.code:
def calculate_bacteria_concentration(x, y, queries):
    MOD = 1000000008
    max_n = max(queries)
    concentrations = [1]
    for i in range(1, max_n + 1):
        value = (concentrations[i - 1] * x - y) % MOD
        concentrations.append(value)
    results = [concentrations[n] for n in queries]
    return results
